data.taskTitle: Create PostToolUse hook handler for question signals
Create PostToolUse hook handler for question signals
data.approach: Extend post-bash-jat-signal.sh to detect question signal type and write to /tmp/jat-question-{session}.json and /tmp/jat-question-tmux-{tmuxSession}.json. The question signal is a state signal (not data signal) so I will add it to STATE_SIGNALS and add special handling to write to the question temp files that the dashboard can poll.
